attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the Goverment ie the prime minister to perhaps step in and help save our jobs at Woolworths.The company is moving into it's Centenary Year and if the company ceases to trade it will leave 30,000 people unemployed. We hope that you will consider and taje some type of action on our behalf this is a heartfelt cry for help to you Mr Brown.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
